p: Detection of BRAF (V600E) mutation was performed using allele-specific PCR with dual-labeled probe as described in [ 91]. PCR cycling conditions were pre-denaturation step 95°С – 2 min, followed by 50 cycles of denaturation (94°С, 10 s), annealing, and elongation (60°С, 15 s). Mutation status was considered positive if the mutant allele content was 3% or more of the wild-type allele.
